posts.post_title: 1888 Old Judge Elmer Smith For Sale :
posts.post_content:
Card has incredible definition, image, etc. -- Elmer Smith of Cincy - Card has angle cut (from factory), but one of the better images you will ever see. No Creases, no wrinkles - superb condition.

$275 (Exactly what I have in it!)
